name: Bron Burs (V)
Lore: 'Ugly scars cover this former commando from southern Nentan. Likes to be on his own. Crack shot. Off and on partner of Debnoli. Relies on intuition to survive.',
Text: 'Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. While present at opponent''s non-docking bay site, cancels its Dark Side game text. Blaster Rifle is a matching weapon for Bron.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
